name: Carousel Drive Unit for K5-K24, for floor mounting
description:
for the automatic driving of the carrousel
Technical data:
Speed: invinitely variable acc. to the cylinder size
and the filling capacity
Drive:
E-motor EEx EII T3, 1,36 kW, 230/400 V, 50 Hz
Overload protection: by friction wheel
Design: acc. to drawing No. 240.12153.001
Painting: RAL 6011 grey
**************************************************************************************

Push-on device, axial, complete
For industrial and household gas cylinders,
consists of:
1x roller conveyor without drive with transitional plate
1x pneumatic stopping device
1x pneumatic drive with two arms
compl. painted RAL 6011
drawing Nr.000.09387.001
